item.title: 2-hour Outer Banks Wild Horse Tour by 4WD Truck
item.description: See the wild horses of Corolla on a 2-hour tour on the Outer Banks in North Carolina. Travel by open-air 4-wheel drive vehicle along the sand dunes and ocean to view the wild horses. Along the way, you'll also hear about the history and ecology of the island, stop for photo ops of the horses and other points of interests, and gain private access to the Wild Horse Conservation Area. Choose from several departure times during the day on a tour that includes 4WD tour and guide.

image.alt: 2-hour Outer Banks Wild Horse Tour by 4WD Truck

item.title: Asheville Night-Time Walking Ghost Tour
item.description: Take a spooky stroll through the streets of downtown Asheville on this ghost walking tour. Led by an expert local guide, learn about the area’s hair-raising tales and dark history, like the woman who haunts the Omni Grove Park Inn, the body entombed in the wall of the Basilica of St. Lawrence, and much more. It's a fascinating, spine-tingling adventure.

image.alt: Asheville Night-Time Walking Ghost Tour

item.title: Charlotte's Premier Historical City Tour on Eco- Friendly Cart
item.description: Explore Charlotte aboard a 7-person golf cart, on this small-group tour of the area. With a local guide at the wheel, visit popular landmarks like the NASCAR Hall of Fame, the Discovery Place, the Mint Museum, the Imaginon and Levine Museum of the New South, and more. Visit all of Charlotte's historical sites, as well some of the more modern, popular areas in the city.

image.alt: Charlotte's Premier Historical City Tour on Eco- Friendly Cart

item.title: Charlotte's Ultimate Southern Charm Historical City Cart Tour
item.description:
Smooth, extra cushion, new golf carts Discounted parking when available. The TRUE Southern Charm Rides tour! Kids 0-4 FREE!!!! Will use Southern Charm bus for extreme temps/weather.
Tours leave promptly!
Take a 5-star/award winning tour deep into our history on luxurious limo golf carts to see why people are saying Southern Charm Rides is #1 historical tour in Charlotte, southern hospitality, food discount, stop for pictures. We give historical information dating back to the 1700s. Learn where Elvis performed, the name Queen City, Fourth Ward neighborhood, gold mines, tales of the cities' history, “medicine man,” first hospital, the Bootlegger house, etc.
For sports fans, Bank of America Stadium, Truist Ball Field, NASCAR Hall of Fame, etc
We travel down the main street showing you art, museums, and many landmarks.
Don’t just take our word for it, read our reviews! Our tours have been the highlight of the trip for many travelers. Also, see Southern Charm Haunted/true crime tour!

image.alt: Charlotte's Ultimate Southern Charm Historical City Cart Tour

item.title: 90 Minute Historic Uptown Neighborhood Segway Tour of Charlotte
item.description: A Segway tour of Charlotte is fun, safe and informative! Follow your knowledgeable local guide as you glide through the upbeat Uptown neighborhood. Sights on this tour include the Bechtler Museum of Modern Art, the Mint Museum, and the Gantt Center. Choose a 1.5-hour ride, or add an extra 30 minutes to see a couple of additional sights: two historic cemeteries and the stadium home of the Carolina Panthers.

image.alt: 90 Minute Historic Uptown Neighborhood Segway Tour of Charlotte

item.title: 2-Hour Guided Segway Tour of Asheville
item.description: Explore the "Paris of the South"—Asheville, North Carolina—on a Segway during this 2-hour guided tour. Traveling via Segway allows you to cover much more ground than you would on foot, which makes this a great comprehensive tour for first-time visitors. You'll get lessons on how to maneuver the 2-wheeled, self-balancing electric scooter before you depart; even beginners will feel safe and comfortable.

image.alt: 2-Hour Guided Segway Tour of Asheville

item.title: Charlotte Comedy City Tour
item.description: Board the funny bus to explore Charlotte’s most interesting neighborhoods, historic places, and landmarks on an adults-only comedy tour with hilarious live commentary. Enjoy BYO beer and wine as you ride through town, and get a funny, local perspective on life in the city. Kick off your evening in Charlotte by laughing along with a friendly crowd of visitors and locals. Take in the sights at night and experience a one-of-a-kind mashup of history and comedy with tickets to Charlotte’s funniest tour.

image.alt: Charlotte Comedy City Tour

item.title: Blue Ridge Parkway Waterfalls Hiking Tour from Asheville
item.description: Hike the best of the Blue Ridge Parkway on this guided day trip to three scenic waterfalls from Asheville. Take in views of the mountains as you tour the classic road in a comfortable van and hear stories about the area’s natural history and culture from your local guide. Watch for blooming laurels and rhododendron as you walk the easy to moderate trails through lush oak and hickory forests. Enjoy light refreshments along the way with plenty of time to relax by the falls before returning to Asheville.

image.alt: Blue Ridge Parkway Waterfalls Hiking Tour from Asheville

item.title: Carolina History and Haunts Charlotte Historical Ghost Walking Tour
item.description: See Charlotte’s most historic and haunted places with a 1.5-hour walking tour through the Fourth Ward. Follow your experienced guide to the city’s most infamous landmarks, where locals have spotted ghosts for centuries. Hear about Charlotte’s ancient Indian trading path and revolutionary battles, and learn the secrets behind uptown’s spookiest mansions. Watch for theatrical ghosts, medical ghosts, famous ghosts and unknown ghosts as you explore Charlotte’s best preserved historical neighborhood.

image.alt: Carolina History and Haunts Charlotte Historical Ghost Walking Tour

item.title: Asheville Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Trolley Tour
item.description: Skip the stress of navigating Asheville's winding streets—and hunting for parking. This classic trolley tour lets you relax while guides reveal the city’s best gems across eight diverse districts, from Montford's historic mansions to South Slope's craft breweries. You can follow your urges, too: Hop on and off during this 90-minute journey to explore at your own pace, no maps or parking fees required.

image.alt: Asheville Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Trolley Tour

item.title: Asheville Insider Guided Walking Tour
item.description: Maximize time in Asheville with a guided walking tour focused on the city’s history, architecture, and culture. Meet your guide for a sightseeing tour including top landmarks like the Thomas Wolfe Memorial, Grove Arcade, and the Basilica of Saint Lawrence. Get to know the unique city of Asheville from the perspective of a local.

image.alt: Asheville Insider Guided Walking Tour

item.title: Gem Mining and Goat Farm Walking Tour in Hendersonville
item.description: Enjoy a day of family-friendly fun at Elijah Mountain Gem Mine and Goat Farm. Suitable for all ages, mine for gems and fossils along indoor and outdoor water flumes and keep whatever you find. Explore the property, tackle an obstacle course, visit the goats in the goat barn, and see peacocks, pheasants, and more in the aviary.

image.alt: Gem Mining and Goat Farm Walking Tour in Hendersonville

item.title: Downtown Asheville Guided Brewery Walking Tour
item.description: Asheville’s reputation as one of the top cities for brews in the Southeast is well-deserved, but the huge number of breweries to choose from can be intimidating for visitors. Discover which breweries are worth the hype on this Asheville brewery tour, which takes you to craft breweries with behind-the-scene access and ample pours at each. Unlike other Asheville brewery tours, this one is led by a certified cicerone, a recognized expert when it comes to beer.

image.alt: Downtown Asheville Guided Brewery Walking Tour

item.title: Downtown Asheville Tip-Based Sightseeing Walking Tour
item.description: Maximize time in Downtown Asheville with a sightseeing tour led by a local guide. Learn about Asheville's history and culture during a city stroll that includes breweries, distilleries, cafes, and historic sites. See popular landmarks like the Basilica of St. Lawrence, Grove Arcade, and the Leaf Global Arts Center. Taste local beer and spirits during brewery and distillery visits. In lieu of a tour ticket, tip your guide whatever amount you find fair.

image.alt: Downtown Asheville Tip-Based Sightseeing Walking Tour

item.title: Waterfall Hike and Jeep Excursion - Waterfall Hiking Tour
item.description: Asheville pops out of the Blue Ridge Mountains, one of the most biodiverse spots on Earth. On this tour, simply meet up with your small group, take a short ride into Pisgah National Forest, and follow the way into the “Land of Waterfalls.” Your guide will provide hiking poles, rain gear, water, snacks, and plenty of knowledge to deepen your experience in this incredible slice of Mother Nature.

image.alt: Waterfall Hike and Jeep Excursion - Waterfall Hiking Tour

item.title: Manteo Historic Walking Tour
item.description: Go beyond the beaches and see how Manteo is one of the country’s most historic—and mysterious—places. Following your local guide, you’ll hear all about the “Lost Colony” of Roanoke, how pirates (like Blackbeard) lived and pillaged right here, the Underground Railroad, and more. In just one short excursion, you’ll traverse 400+ years of history at its wildest.

image.alt: Manteo Historic Walking Tour

item.title: Electric Bike Brewery Crawl of Asheville
item.description: Cycle to three of Asheville’s most popular microbreweries, enjoying a drink at the first location. You’ll be riding a state-of-the-art e-bike, so the hills won’t be a problem. In addition to soaking up the local vibe and great scenery, you’ll sample some of the best craft brews in town. If you like beer and bikes, you'll love this tour.

image.alt: Electric Bike Brewery Crawl of Asheville

item.title: UPTOWN FUNK: 1 Hour Guided City Walking Tour in Charlotte
item.description: Walk through the heart of Charlotte with a guide who really knows their stuff. Whether you’re a new arrival looking to settle into the city or a tourist visiting for the first time, this tour has plenty to offer. You’ll learn facts about Charlotte’s past and present while you take in the sights of the city center.

image.alt: UPTOWN FUNK: 1 Hour Guided City Walking Tour in Charlotte

item.title: Trolley Pub Tour of Charlotte
item.description: Combine city sightseeing with a drinking experience you won’t soon forget during this Charlotte Trolley Pub Crawl Tour—perfect for travelers who like to stay active while having fun. A guide plans a route through Charlotte’s Uptown area based on riders requests and then makes two to three stops for the group. This experience is great for avoiding crowds and keeps you from having to walk the distance you cover.

image.alt: Trolley Pub Tour of Charlotte

item.title: Eagles Island 50 minute Narrated Boat Cruise
item.description: For those who want to bypass the crowds in Wilmington, but still want to get an overview of the area, this Eagle Island Narrated Boat Cruise is a great choice. Depending on what time you book, you’ll either cruise along the historic downtown and Eagle Island, or you’ll go under the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge. Both options provide live commentary for you to enjoy as you cruise.

image.alt: Eagles Island 50 minute Narrated Boat Cruise

item.title: Sailing Charters in Wilmington
item.description: Take in the Wilmington riverwalk from the water and experience the thrill of sailing with this exclusive private sailboat charter. Set off along the downtown riverfront to admire the city from a unique perspective, including the state ports and other waterfront landmarks. Relax with your group of up to six passengers, with the option of bringing your own drinks on board. Choose a morning, afternoon, or sunset tour to suit your schedule.

image.alt: Sailing Charters in Wilmington

item.title: Privately Guided Half Day Hike
item.description: Discover the natural beauty that lies just outside of Asheville by booking a guided hike. This private experience can be tailored to your needs and preferences, whether you want a challenging adventure or an easy-going walk. Depending on where you go, your tour may include waterfalls, mountain views, or biodiverse forests.

image.alt: Privately Guided Half Day Hike

item.title: History and Architecture Walking Tour
item.description: Wilmington, North Carolina, was founded in the 1720s, which means that the city has over 300 years of colonial history and architecture scattered throughout its streets. Join a local for a guided tour of the city, learning about its history from settlement through today. You’ll also uncover the stories behind its architectural styles which range from Spanish Baroque to Neoclassical.

image.alt: History and Architecture Walking Tour

item.title: Charlotte Haunted Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour
item.description: Uncover the sordid history of Charlotte, North Carolina as you embark on a walking tour and pub crawl through the historic district. Listen to your guide recount spooky stories of Charlotte's ghosts while you explore the area. This tour stops at several bars, where you can purchase drinks, as well as landmarks like the Dunhill Hotel and Old Settlers Cemetery.

image.alt: Charlotte Haunted Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour
